Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a tapped colorless Desert land token with “{T}: Add {C}.” This ability triggers only once each turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control seven or more lands, discover 4. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
